availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Reed (Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, saddler and merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Caroline L. Nevel Reed in Cynthiana, Kentucky, in August 1859. Father of Carrie B. Reed. Employed by James T. Clark as a saddler in Pendleton County in 1850. Merchant in Pendleton County in 1860. Gardener in Pendleton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 351B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 5.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Coker, p. 295B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, 1850-1862, Film #000216897, p. 127, p. 31 of 702 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Film #7012982: Covington, Certificates 1-738 (1895), p. 663, p. 677 of 768 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, “Robert Henry Reed (1822-1895)," Memorial # 105822229, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105822229/robert-henry-reed (accessed March 3, 2021).
